text: Daouda Guindo (born 14 October 2002) is a Malian professional footballer. He plays as a defender for Red Bull Salzburg. ==Career== ===Club=== Guindo started his career with Guidars FC in Mali. In January 2021 Guindo signed with Austrian club Red Bull Salzburg together with his clubmates Nene Dorgeles and Mamady Diambou. He was loaned to Salzburg's feeder club FC Liefering. He made his debut on 12 February 2021 versus Austria Lustenau. He also played for FC Red Bull Salzburg.Homepage Red Bull Salzburg (German) His first match in was on 25th September 2021 when he came in in min. 92 for Andreas Ulmer versus Wolfsberger AC. Soccerway In July 2022 he was loaned to FC St. Gallen in the Swiss Super League.Kicker.de ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National Cup Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Liefering (loan) 2020–21 2.
